org.prebake.html
Interface TextChunk

public interface TextChunk

Represents a chunk of HTML along with sizing and positioning info.

Method Summary
Modifier and Type Method and Description
 boolean breaks()
          True if the next chunk following this chunk should fall on a new line.
 int height()
          The number of lines in the plain text form.
 int width()
          The width of the plain text form.
 void write(int containerWidth, java.lang.StringBuilder out)
          Appends the plain text form to the output buffer.
 

Method Detail

width

int width()
The width of the plain text form.

height

int height()
The number of lines in the plain text form.

write

void write(int containerWidth,
           java.lang.StringBuilder out)
Appends the plain text form to the output buffer.

Parameters:
containerWidth - a hint at the width of the container in case the chunk wishes to center or right justify itself. This hint might be wrong on the low side but will not be wrong on the high side, so the chunk can always assume it has at least as much space as containerWidth.

breaks

boolean breaks()
True if the next chunk following this chunk should fall on a new line.
